trans-unit.source: Represents a menu that is displayed in the context of a particular control.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextMenu"></xref> class.
Unloads the container for the specified item.
This method undoes the effects of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextMenu.PrepareContainerForItemOverride%2A> method.
The element that is used to display the item.
The item to display from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*> collection.
Returns a new <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem"></xref> object.
A new <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem"></xref> container object that is used to display an item from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*> collection.
Gets a value that indicates whether at least one menu item is a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery"></xref>.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if at least one menu item is a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextMenu.HasGallery*> dependency property.
To be added.
Returns a value that indicates whether the specified item is (or is eligible to be) its own container.
The item to test.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the item is a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem"></xref>, a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSeparator"></xref>, or a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Creates a new <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonContextMenuAutomationPeer"></xref> object for this control.
A new automation peer object for this control.
Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"></xref> routed event.
The event data.
Prepares the specified element to display the specified item.
The element that is used to display the item.
The item to display from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*> collection.

Returns a value that indicates whether to apply the style from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle*> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyleSelector*> property to the container element of the specified item.
The container element.
The item to display.
if container is a , , or ; otherwise, the value returned by the base implementation.
